alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 13 at 9:03AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following county, in west central Ohio, Darke. * WHEN...Until noon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 903 AM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Gauges around Union City have recorded 2.12 and 1.3 inches. Near Greenville, 1.88 inches was measured. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Greenville, Union City, Arcanum, Wayne Lakes, Pitsburg, Palestine, Abbottsville, Sharpeye, Sharps Crossing and Union Corners.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
